TestSuit.Name: PTZ Using Media2 Continuous Positioning Test Cases

Test.Name: GetProfiles: default specs for PTZContinuousPositioningPanTiltVelocityGenericSpace
Test.Description: 1. GetProfilesResponse: 1st profile has PTZContinuousPositioningPanTiltVelocityGenericSpace = http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/PanTiltSpaces/VelocityGenericSpace 2. ContinuousMove without space

Test.Name: GetProfiles: default specs for PTZContinuousPositioningPanTiltVelocityGenericSpace
Test.Description: 1. GetProfilesResponse: required profile does not have required space 2. SetConfiguration to required space 3. ContinuousMove without space

Test.Name: GetCompatibleConfigurations: default specs for PTZContinuousPositioningPanTiltVelocityGenericSpace
Test.Description: 1. GetCompatibleConfigurations: required profile requested 2. AddConfiguration: required profile, config with required space 3. ContinousMove without space

Test.Name: GetCompatibleConfigurations: default specs for PTZContinuousPositioningPanTiltVelocityGenericSpace
Test.Description: 1. GetCompatibleConfigurations: required profile requested, not required space 2. AddConfiguration: required profile, config with not required space 3. SetConfiguration - required space 4. ContinuouseMove without space

Test.Name: GetProfiles: default specs for PTZContinuousPositioningPanTiltVelocityGenericSpace
Test.Description: 1. GetProfilesResponse - required profile with not required space 2. Move

Test.Name: GetCompatibleConfigurations: default specs for PTZContinuousPositioningPanTiltVelocityGenericSpace
Test.Description: 1. GetCompatibleConfigurations: no required space 2. AddConfiguration: required profile, PTZ config 3. SetConfiguration: not required space 4. ContinuousMove without space
